description: Methods that list, add and remove hybrid-connections from webapps.

commands.name: az webapp hybrid-connection add
commands.summary: Add an existing hybrid-connection to a webapp.
examples: az webapp hybrid-connection add -g MyResourceGroup -n MyWebapp --namespace [HybridConnectionNamespace] --hybrid-connection [HybridConnectionName] -s [slot]

commands.name: az webapp hybrid-connection list
commands.summary: List the hybrid-connections on a webapp.
examples: az webapp hybrid-connection list -g MyResourceGroup -n MyWebapp -s [slot]

commands.name: az webapp hybrid-connection remove
commands.summary: Remove a hybrid-connection from a webapp.
examples: az webapp hybrid-connection remove  -g MyResourceGroup -n MyWebapp --namespace [HybridConnectionNamespace] --hybrid-connection [HybridConnectionName] -s [slot]
